title: Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles, Bath Dual-Sided Long Handle Back Scrubber Body Exfoliator for Wet or Dry Brushing
descriptions:
**Experience the Ultimate Showering Experience with the Metene Shower Brush**

Upgrade your daily shower routine with the Metene Shower Brush, a game-changing dual-sided long handle back scrubber that combines the gentle touch of soft nylon bristles with the exfoliating power of natural stiff bristles. 

This versatile shower brush is perfect for both wet and dry brushing, allowing you to customize your skin care routine to your liking. The soft bristles gently clean and wash your skin, while the stiff bristles provide an invigorating exfoliating experience that leaves your skin feeling smooth and refreshed.

The 17-inch wooden handle is designed for comfort and convenience, featuring a non-slip rubber patch and a hanging rope for easy storage and grip. The long handle allows you to reach those hard-to-scrub areas, making it perfect for back scrubbing and exfoliating.

To keep your Metene Shower Brush in top condition, simply wash it every few weeks and replace it every 3-6 months. With proper care, this shower brush will become a trusted companion in your daily skin care routine.

Order your Metene Shower Brush today and discover a more refreshing and invigorating showering experience!

**Key Features:**

- Dual-sided design with soft and stiff bristles for customizable skin care
- Suitable for both wet and dry brushing
- 17-inch wooden handle with non-slip rubber patch and hanging rope
- Perfect for back scrubbing and exfoliating
- Easy maintenance and replacement
- Includes one shower brush in the package

**Experience the Metene difference and upgrade your shower routine today!**
